help_security_portrangefowarding.lang_hspr1: Port Range Forwarding allows you to set up public services on your network, such as web servers, FTP servers, email servers, or other specialized Internet applications.
help_security_portrangefowarding.lang_hspr2: Note: After you have made your changes, click Save Settings to apply your changes.
help_security_portrangefowarding.lang_hspr5: Enter the name of the application.
help_security_portrangefowarding.lang_hspr7: Enter the number or range of port(s) used by incoming traffic.
help_security_portrangefowarding.lang_hspr9: Select the protocol(s) used for this application.
help_security_portrangefowarding.lang_hspr11: Enter the IP address of the server running the specific application.
help_security_portrangefowarding.lang_hspr14: Note: For more information, refer to the online User Guide at www.linksys.com.
